targets.query: SELECT (mean("ip_conntrack_count") / mean("ip_conntrack_max"))  AS "percent" FROM "conntrack" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("pkts") FROM "iptables" WHERE ("ruleid" = 'default drop' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("ip_conntrack_count") / mean("ip_conntrack_max"))  AS "percent" FROM "conntrack" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
